data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ramírez-Sánchez, Marcia M., Rivas, Gerardo (2013): New species of subgenus Megaluracarus (Acari: Hydrachnidiae: Arrenuridae: Arrenurus) from Mexico. Zootaxa 3718 (4): 317-330, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3718.4.2
